name: The Best of the Bunch
description:
The Best of the Bunch is a 2D shooter game where you have to choose between three randomized weapons each round. You don't know what the three weapons are but you will have to choose one of them . One of them is the Best of the Bunch(The Cream of the Crop) if you get the Best of the bunch your weapon will cause more damage and have a higher fire rate.

This game was made for 10th Curdle game jam :https://itch.io/jam/curdle-jam-10

Also this game is missing alot of features and it is very Unbalanced soooo Yeah.
